SELECT r.WEB_TYPE, r.REQUEST_IP, r.SYSTEM_PATH, r.BLOG_ID, r.IP_ADDRESS, r.IP_COUNTRY, r.IP_REGION, r.IP_CITY, r.SOCIAL_TYPE, r.PARAM, r.STATE, r.NOTE, i.BLOG_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(r.REQUEST_TIME,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%S') AS REQUEST_TIME FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST r LEFT JOIN T_BLOG_DETAIL_INFO i ON r.BLOG_ID = i.BLOG_ID WHERE 1=1
r.REQUEST_IP = #requestIp#
ORDER BY REQUEST_TIME DESC LIMIT #start#, #end#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS queryCount FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BLOG_ID, SOCIAL_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS SOCIAL_READ FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE BLOG_ID = #blogId# GROUP BY SOCIAL_TYPE, BLOG_ID ) cbs ORDER BY cbs.SOCIAL_READ DESC
SELECT REQUEST_IP, COUNT(*) AS RCOUNT FROM T_SYSTEM_REQUEST WHERE IP_ADDRESS IS NULL OR IP_COUNTRY IS NULL OR IP_REGION IS NULL OR IP_CITY IS NULL GROUP BY REQUEST_IP
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_SYSTEM_REQUEST SET IP_ADDRESS = #ipAddress#, IP_COUNTRY = #country#, IP_REGION = #region#, IP_CITY = #city# WHERE REQUEST_IP = #requestIp#
